title: Ranked trial
body: Hey I just reach level 30 and there's a rank trial and how many wins u need to get in order to go to sliver 5??? I'm scared I gonna be in bronze becuz I heard many who has being in bronze has being stuck in for 3 years

replies.body: You'll get 10 placement matches to help matchmaking determine where you will currently best fit.  There's no guarantee to where you'll place, but you'll be able to continue playing games and climb up the ladder.  More info in our[ ranked play guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ)as well!  Good luck!

LOL. They're only stuck because they are not capable of being that rank.
You don't get "stuck" there, it's your skill.
It depends on how you play, your mmr, not so much on wins / losses, though, that does help.
Play your best and don't tilt, you'll most likely get at LEAST silver 5.
